title: Why are people so mad about IITs? Everyone in my class talks about IITs and clearing the JEE. - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, You, me infact every body in this world want a high standard of living and a luxurious life. Inorder to achieve that many of us try to excel in education. Coming to engineering field in India the highly developed infrastructure, world class facilities and excellent career oppurtunities are in IITs at a low expenditure an average person can bear with.They have good sports facilities, well equipped libraries, hostels, around 1-2 Gbps internet etc., and mainly encouragement to develop ourselves in various fields.You will also get a decent job here if you do some work.This is the reasons IITs have that much craze. Thank you.,
